channel.title: Nobel Prize on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Nobel Prize on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Should the Cox Proportional Hazards model get the Nobel Prize in Medicine?
item.description: I’m not the first one to suggest that Biostatistics has been undervalued in the scientific community, and some of the shortcomings of epidemiology and biostatistics have been noted elsewhere. But this previous work focuses primarily on the contributions of statistics/biostatistics at the purely scientific level. The Cox Proportional Hazards model is one of the most widely used statistical models in the analysis of data from clinical trials and other medical studies.
